message: Han Solo.
I'm captain of the Millennium Falcon.
Chewie here told me you're looking for passage to the Alderaan system.

quickReplies.message: Yes indeed. If it's a fast ship.

fast-ship.message: Fast ship? You've never heard of the Millennium Falcon?

message: It's the ship that made the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs.
I've outrun Imperial starships, not the local bulk cruisers, mind you. I'm talking about the big Corellian ships now. She's fast enough for you, old man.
What's the cargo?

quickReplies.text: Only passengers -- and no questions asked.
message: Only passengers. Myself, the boy, two droids.
And no questions asked.
__laughs__
What is it? Some kind of local trouble?

quickReplies.message: Let's just say we'd like to avoid any Imperial entanglements.

message: Well, that's the real trick, isn't it? And it's going to cost you something extra.
Ten thousand, all in advance.
Ten thousand?
We could almost buy our own ship for that.

quickReplies.message: We can pay you two thousand now, plus fifteen, when we reach Alderaan.

message: But who's going to fly it kid?
You?
You bet I could. I'm not such a bad pilot myself! We don't have to sit here and listen to...
__Obi-Wan takes over__
We can pay you two thousand now, plus fifteen, when we reach Alderaan.
Okay. You guys got yourself a ship.
We'll leave as soon as you're ready.
Docking bay ninety-four.
Yes, Greo. As a matter of fact, I was just going to see your boss.
Tell Jabba I've got his money.
It's too late.
You should have paid him when you had the chance.
Jabba's put a price on your head so large every bounty hunter in the galaxy will be looking for you.
__hehehe__
I'm lucky I found you first.

yeah-but.message: Yeah, but this time I've got the money.

quickReplies.message: If you give it to me, I might forget I found you.

message: __raises voice__
I don't have it with me. Tell Jabba...
Jabba's through with you.
He has no time for smugglers who drop their shipments at the first sign of an Imperial cruiser.

even-I-get-boarded.message: Even I get boarded sometimes. You think I had a choice?

message: You can tell that to Jabba.
He may only take your ship.
That's the idea.
I've been looking forward to this for a long time...
Yes, I bet you have.
*shoots!*
Sorry about the mess.
__tosses coin to bartender__
But I got a nice easy charter now.
I'll pay you back, plus a little extra, I just need a little more time.
__In Huttese__
Han, my boy, I'm only doing this because you're the best and I need you.
So, for an extra twenty...
__Huttese__
__Huttese__
__Huttese...__
Jabba
You're a wonderful human being.
